sessionDetails: Jone has been having trouble focusing in class and has had minor altercations with peers. Discussed strategies for managing frustration and staying on task.
actionPlan: Scheduled weekly check-ins for the next 4 weeks. Provided Jone with a 'calm-down' card to use when feeling overwhelmed. Will monitor peer interactions.

sessionDetails: Adi is expressing anxiety about reading aloud in class. She is a strong reader but fears making mistakes in front of her peers.
actionPlan: Will practice reading in a small, supportive group setting. Encouraged Adi to choose the book for the next read-aloud session to build confidence. Provided positive reinforcement.
